9. Build Web App

Build the web app:

  1. Get the code
    1. Get the code from https://github.com/WildAid/o-fish-web
      git clone https://github.com/WildAid/o-fish-web.git

      git clone https://github.com/WildAid/o-fish-realm.git
      OR
      Download and extract the code

  2. Go into the o-fish-web directory cd o-fish-web
  3. edit src/.env/config.js: appName is your Realm App Name stitchAppId is the Realm App ID stitchBaseUrl should be https://realm.mongodb.com
  4. On commandline, run: npm run build
  5. In the Stitch UI in your browser, click on “Hosting” on the left-hand side under “MANAGE”


  6. Enable hosting by clicking the big green button:


  7. You will be sent back to this page:


  8. Drag and drop the contents of the build folder onto the Stitch window. There should be about 10 files and folders in the directory when you are done. It is OK to overwrite existing files.


  9. Run Actions/Flush CDN Cache, click “Flush Cache” when prompted.


  10. Make note of the URL on the Hosting page, this is your website! Paste it to the “URL” field in the template


Proceed to the next step when the blue bar no longer appear saying “Your site is in the process of being created, which may take up to 15 minutes.”
